#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,c;
    string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        c=0;
        cin>>s;
        for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
        {
            if((int)s[i]<58&&(int)s[i]>47)
            {
                c+=s[i]-'0';
            }
        }
        cout<<c<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
